tool_description: Manages attributes for database entities including primary keys, data types, and constraints.

entity_id.description: Unique identifier of the entity to modify

attribute_names.description: List of attribute names to add to the entity

data_types.description: Data types for each attribute (VARCHAR, INTEGER, DATE, etc.)

primary_key_attributes.description: Attribute names that form the primary key

nullable_attributes.description: Attribute names that can contain null values

unique_attributes.description: Attribute names that must have unique values

error_messages: Entity not found: The specified entity_id does not exist in the current schema.
Mismatched arrays: attribute_names and data_types arrays must have the same length.
Invalid data type: One or more data types are not recognized database types.
Invalid primary key: Primary key attributes must be subset of attribute_names.
Duplicate attribute: One or more attribute names already exist for this entity.
usage: Provide entity_id, attribute_names, and data_types arrays of equal length. Optionally specify primary_key_attributes, nullable_attributes, and unique_attributes.

primary_key_set.description: Whether primary key was successfully defined

attribute_summary.description: List of all attributes with their properties
